resources.string:
Hi, my name is Nishit. 

I love Fish. 

The kind that is alive and swims around in an aquarium or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 

Sometimes I like to go to the garden or a lake. 

And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

I like to explore some areas, from where I can get some experience. 

I wanna jump from the helicopter, go inside the sea and a lot more. 

Once, I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a chef that cook me food. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make an aquarium.
